alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:57PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Twin Falls and southeastern Owyhee Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 1256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bruneau River Launch Site to Juniper Butte. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Brief heavy rains also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Juniper Butte, Salls Crossing, Juniper Ranch and Crawfish Crossing around 100 PM MDT. Coonskin Butte, Black Butte, Horse Butte and Clover Butte around 140 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley
